brand.name: Neil Patel
brand.primaryCTA: Let’s Grow Your Revenue Through Digital Marketing.

audienceSignals: Businesses looking to grow revenue through digital marketing

valueProps.text: Offers a variety of resources to help businesses succeed
Provides algorithmic-proof strategies for optimal visibility

pains: Need for optimal visibility across platforms
proof: Works with renowned brands like HP, SoFi, Mitsubishi Motors, Champion, ESPN, Adobe, Western Union, Accor, CNN, PWC, DIRECTV, LinkedIn, Ricoh, Tata, Tektronix, Intuit

facts.text: Neil Patel offers services in multiple languages including English, Portuguese, German, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, and French.
facts.evidence: English (EN), Português (BR), Deutsch (DE), Español (ES), Italiano (IT), Nederlands (NL), Français (FR)

facts.text: Neil Patel's primary call to action is 'Let’s Grow Your Revenue Through Digital Marketing.'
facts.evidence: Let’s Grow Your Revenue Through Digital Marketing.

facts.text: NP Digital is described as an award-winning global ad agency.
facts.evidence: Meet My Award-Winning Global Ad Agency

facts.text: NP Digital operates in various countries including the United States, Canada, Brazil, India, Australia, United Kingdom, Japan, Malaysia, Germany, Hong Kong, Singapore, France, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, and Mexico.
facts.evidence: United States, Canada, Brazil, India, Australia, United Kingdom, Japan, Malaysia, Germany, Hong Kong, Singapore, France, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Mexico

facts.text: NP Digital is globally recognized and works with renowned brands.
facts.evidence: Globally Recognized Working With Renowned Brands

facts.text: Some of the brands NP Digital works with include HP, SoFi, Mitsubishi Motors, Champion, ESPN, Adobe, Western Union, Accor, CNN, PWC, DIRECTV, LinkedIn, Ricoh, Tata, Tektronix, Intuit.
facts.evidence: HP, SoFi, Mitsubishi Motors, Champion, ESPN, Adobe, Western Union, Accor, CNN, PWC, DIRECTV, LinkedIn, Ricoh, Tata, Tektronix, Intuit

facts.text: NP Digital offers resources such as a digital marketing blog and tools like AnswerThePublic, AdsGrader, and Ubersuggest.
facts.evidence: Neil Patel’s Digital Marketing Blog, AnswerThePublic, AdsGrader, Ubersuggest

facts.text: Neil Patel’s Digital Marketing Blog is a resource for digital marketing tips, trends, and strategy.
facts.evidence: Neil Patel’s Digital Marketing Blog Your #1 resource for digital marketing tips, trends, and strategy

facts.text: AnswerThePublic is a free search insights tool offered by NP Digital.
facts.evidence: Find out what your audience is searching for online with our free search insights tool.

facts.text: NP Digital offers services in earned media, paid media, data & analytics, creative, and technology.
facts.evidence: Earned Media, Paid Media, Data & Analytics, Creative, Technology

facts.text: Earned media strategies by NP Digital are designed to align with Google best practices and ensure optimal visibility across platforms.
facts.evidence: Our algorithmic-proof strategies not only help align websites with Google best practices, they ensure optimal visibility across other earned media platforms

facts.text: NP Digital is a 100% remote workplace with industry-leading benefits.
facts.evidence: NP Digital is a 100% remote workplace with industry-leading benefits.

facts.text: NP Digital emphasizes work-life balance for its team members.
facts.evidence: We put work-life balance first, so our team members are always on top of their game.

facts.text: NP Digital's strategies ensure optimal visibility across platforms like Google Play, the App Store, YouTube, Amazon, and Pinterest.
facts.evidence: they ensure optimal visibility across other earned media platforms, like Google Play, the App Store, YouTube, Amazon and Pinterest.
